document_data.name: Lord's Keep
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Lord's Keep''' was a fortification in the town of [[Llorkh]] in the [[Savage Frontier]] and the seat of power of the town's Lord.

Shortly before [[1357 DR]], Lord [[Phintarn|Phintarn "Redblade"]] was found dead at the foot of the Lord's Keep. Overnight, the mage [[Geildarr]] seized the Lord's Keep and claimed the throne, naming himself the new Lord and paving the way for a Zhentarim takeover. He remained installed in the Lord's Keep through [[1370 DR]].
